function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Evaluation and assessment of building automation and control systems could lead to design flaws that impact building performance.","Impact":"Reduced energy efficiency, increased maintenance and faults, decreased comfort, and lack of information to occupants.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough testing and simulations, involve building occupants in the assessment, and incorporate feedback loops for continuous improvement.","Technologies":"Building simulation software, IoT sensors, feedback control systems.","People":"Building designers, engineers, and evaluation experts.","Owner":"Building design and evaluation teams."}]}
